property.name: mediadisplayblurb
property.value: U.S. service member working with an interpreter

note.text: Before an event or meeting, brief the interpreter on:

- The points to be covered.
- Key concepts, words, and phrases, especially technical vocabulary.
- The name, position, and status of your audience members.
- Any written documents or visual aids that will be used.
- The physical layout of the place where you will be working.
Ask local interpreters to brief you on culture, customs, and current events.
